service.title: Service Description
service.content: The "Bedtime Stories" platform provides access to a collection of children's stories and tales, designed for reading to children before bedtime. Our service includes:
service.features: Library of stories and tales, Categorization by topics and age groups, Ability to search and filter content, Access to illustrations and images

usage.title: Usage Rights
usage.content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable right to use the Platform for personal, non-commercial purposes in compliance with these Terms.
usage.allowedItems: Reading stories to children, Using content for educational purposes, Sharing links to our Platform, Printing stories for personal use
usage.prohibitedItems: Commercial use of content without permission, Copying and distributing content for commercial purposes, Modifying or creating derivative works, Using automated tools to collect content

stories.title: About Stories on the Platform
stories.content: Stories on the website are adaptations based on well-known stories that are in the public domain. The adaptation is made to maximally fit the designated age ranges, however parents should familiarize themselves with the text and independently decide whether it is suitable for their child before reading it or giving it to their child to read. The adaptation is made both with the help of software and with the help of human review.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Bedtime Stories
privacy.description: Learn how we protect your privacy on our stories platform.
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, privacy, stories

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: The "Bedtime Stories" platform (hereinafter — "we", "our", "Platform") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect information about you.
introduction.agreement: By using our Platform, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

provided.title: Information You Provide to Us
provided.content: We may collect information that you voluntarily provide to us:
provided.items: Name and contact information (when sending messages through the contact form), Messages and feedback you send to us, Information you provide during registration (if such functionality is added)

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
automatic.content: When visiting our Platform, we automatically collect certain information:
automatic.items: Server logs: IP address, browser type, operating system, access time, Cookies: small files that help improve Platform functionality, Analytics: information about how you use our Platform, Device: information about your device and browser

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
usage.items: Providing and improving our services, Responding to your questions and feedback, Analyzing Platform usage to improve user experience, Ensuring security and preventing fraud, Compliance with legal obligations, Sending important notifications about changes to our services

sharing.title: Sharing Information with Third Parties
sharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or transfer your personal information to third parties, except in the following cases:
sharing.items: With your consent: when you explicitly allow us to share information, Service providers: trusted partners who help us provide services, Legal requirements: when required by law or to protect our rights, Security: to prevent fraud or ensure security

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
cookies.items: Remember your preferences, Analyze Platform usage, Improve performance, Personalize content
cookies.management: You can manage cookie settings in your browser. Note that disabling cookies may affect Platform functionality.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information:
security.items: Using encryption for data transmission, Regular security system updates, Limited access to personal information, Monitoring systems for suspicious activity
security.note: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information.

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.content: We store your personal information only for the time necessary to achieve the purposes described in this Privacy Policy or in accordance with legal requirements.
storage.deletion: When we no longer need your personal information, we securely delete or anonymize it.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights.items: Right of access: receive a copy of your personal information, Right to rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete information, Right to erasure: delete your personal information, Right to restriction: limit processing of your information, Right to portability: receive your information in a structured format, Right to object: object to processing of your information

children.title: Children and Privacy
children.content: Our Platform is intended for family use, but we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without parental or guardian consent.
children.removal: If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 13 without appropriate consent, we will immediately delete this information.

international.title: International Data Transfer
international.content: Your information may be transferred and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We take measures to ensure that such transfer complies with applicable data protection laws.

changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a new version on our Platform and updating the "Last updated" date.
changes.recommendation: We recommend regularly reviewing this Privacy Policy to stay informed about how we protect your information.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

effective.content: This Privacy Policy takes effect from the moment it is published and remains in force until it is repealed or changed.
